item.description:
SPEED DATING FOR DYKES

30+ speed dating and those who date them

Saturday January 23, 2010
7:00 PM

$10

The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St , Malden

Minutes from Malden Center T stop

Find that someone for cuddling or frolicking in the snow! Meeting hotties doesn't get any easier than this. You get 4 minutes with a bunch of different singles, we provide conversation topics to get you started and a painless way at the end of the evening to tell the cuties you liked that, well, that you like 'em. Better than that, you'll support the Boston Dyke March!

First come, first serve. Seats fill up fast, so get in line before 7:00 pm.

Dance at the Hide Away after speed dating for an additional charge!

For more information:

bostondykemarch.com
http://www.facebook.c...
http://lgbtfriends.me...
dykemarch@gmail.com



This speed dating event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March. Please support The Hide Away, our speed dating co-sponsor.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: SPEED DATING FOR DYKES
